description: Bridges: The bridge interface has incorrect method signature for `getCurrent()`. Missed return type. That violates the rule "All bridge interface methods must have exactly the same or more strict signature as their parent"

Boolean methods do not use `get` prefix, use `is`/`has` instead or alike. Getter `Spryker\Glue\ProductPricesRestApi\ProductPricesRestApiConfig::getPermissionCheckEnabled()` must not return bool.
